t: Amazon.com: Grow-with-Me Crib Conversion Kits: Million Dollar Baby
s: ✅ GROWS WITH YOU - This kit allows you to accommodate your growing child, converting your existing crib to a full-size bed. Using your crib’s headboard and footboard, these rails allow you to easily transform your crib into a full-size bed (also known as a double bed).

t: Conversion Kits | Romina Furniture | Solid Wood | Baby Safe
s: Our conversion kits allows you to convert the crib to a full-size bed. The kit consists of two long rails connecting the headboard to the footboard and two sets of wooden slats to allow for placement of the mattress directly onto the platform without the need of a box spring.
